publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1771 Ross Finnie: Rural Scotland—That the Parliament welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment to rural areas, especially during and after the foot and mouth crisis; endorses the Executive’s commitment to the eradication of the disease as essential for the long-term future of the rural economy, including tourism; endorses the provision of clear guidance on public access; welcomes the steps being taken to provide hardship relief, and supports the Executive’s commitment to assist Scotland’s vital rural communities and industries. Supported by: Mr Alasdair Morrison*
